channel.title: [PI] bandos, PM, combat!
channel.description: 1)When I send PM it dubles, how to fix it? 2)How to make that with shortbow you can use bronze arrows to fire. 3)How to make that when I type "/" it shows it, not a letter "a" 4)How to make save prayer type. Its saves it but when you log in, prayer type is back to normal. But when you pray at altar it says "changed back to noraml" so how to fix, that it really save? 5)How to fix, that in shop when you buy, you buy 1 thing, not 2. 6)How to fix, that with hand you can train str and deff xp if you chose them, not only attack xp when you chosed to train str.?

find ur bandos anim and add it in the anim.java
and i think in your npc.cfg but i note this migth not be how im assuming .

item.title: [PI] bandos, PM, combat!
item.dc:creator: @zond zond
item.description:
@zond wrote:

1)When I send PM it dubles, how to fix it?
2)How to make that with shortbow you can use bronze arrows to fire.
3)How to make that when I type “/” it shows it, not a letter “a”
4)How to make save prayer type. Its saves it but when you log in, prayer type is back to normal. But when you pray at altar it says “changed back to noraml” so how to fix, that it really save?
5)How to fix, that in shop when you buy, you buy 1 thing, not 2.
6)How to fix, that with hand you can train str and deff xp if you chose them, not only attack xp when you chosed to train str.?

Read full topic
